alert.note: Alert for Eastern Windham; Western Windham (Vermont) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albany (Eastern New York and Western New England)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 22 at 11:48PM EDT by NWS Albany
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Windham County through 1230 AM EDT... At 1148 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Townshend, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Bellows Falls, Townshend, Saxtons River, Westminster, Windham, Rockingham, Grafton, Brookline, Athens, North Westminster, East Putney, Brockways Mills, South Windham, East Jamaica, Cambridgeport, Harmonyville, Simpsonville, West Townshend, Westminster West and Lawrence Four Corners. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
